org.youscope.uielements

Class ComponentComboBox<C extends Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • org.youscope.uielements.ComponentComboBox<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Basic type of components to configure, e.g. JobConfiguration.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class ComponentComboBox<C extends Configuration>
extends javax.swing.JButton
    A dropdown list to select components to configure.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentComboBox

        public ComponentComboBox(YouScopeClient client,
                         java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                         java.lang.Class<?>... requiredInterface)
        Constructs a new combo box with all components added being of the given configuration class, and implementing all of the given required interfaces.
        Parameters:
        client - YouScope client.
        configurationClass - Configuration class of components, e.g. JobConfiguration.class.
        requiredInterface - Additional interfaces which are required, e.g. TableProducerConfiguration.class.

      • ComponentComboBox

        public ComponentComboBox(YouScopeClient client,
                         java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass)
        Constructs a new combo box with all components added being of the given configuration class.
        Parameters:
        client - YouScope client.
        configurationClass - Configuration class of components, e.g. JobConfiguration.class.

      • ComponentComboBox

        public ComponentComboBox(java.lang.Class<C> configurationClass,
                         ComponentMetadata<? extends C>[] componentMetadata)
        Constructs a new combo box with all components added being passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        configurationClass - Configuration class of components, e.g. JobConfiguration.class.
        componentMetadata - Metadata of the components which can be selected.

      • getNumChoices

        public int getNumChoices()
        Returns the number of choices the user has. Useful for not displaying this combobox if user anyway does not have a choice...
        Returns:
        Number of choices the user has.

      • setPopupLocation

        public void setPopupLocation(int location)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the location of the popup menu relative to the button. Available choices are SwingConstants.BOTTOM or SwingConstants.RIGHT. All other choices will invoke an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        location - Location where the popup should be shown relative to the button.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if location is invalid.

      • setSelectedElement

        public void setSelectedElement(ComponentMetadata<? extends C> element)
        Sets the currently selected element. If element is not one of the selectable elements, does nothing. If element is null, selects a random element.
        Parameters:
        element - Element to select.

      • setSelectedElement

        public void setSelectedElement(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
        Sets the currently selected element. If element is not one of the selectable elements, does nothing. If element is null, selects a random element.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - Type identifier of the element to select.
